name: duccbot-display
description: To show rankings of the DuccBot Ranking system nicely
author: Netsky

scripts.build-docker-amd64: yarn build && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 BUILDKIT_PROGRESS=plain docker build --no-cache -t meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1-amd64 --build-arg ARCH=amd64 .
scripts.build-docker-arm64: yarn build && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 BUILDKIT_PROGRESS=plain docker build --no-cache -t meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1-amd64 --build-arg ARCH=arm64 .
scripts.win-build-docker: yarn build && docker build --no-cache -t meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1-amd64 --build-arg ARCH=arm64 .
scripts.create-docker-manifest: docker manifest create meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1 --amend meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1-amd64 --amend meppi/duccbot-display:v1.0.1-arm64
